text: Mbe fhum nan kameŋ mbararagim, mbe khaŋ nzuai “Mba guma, ana fharav nza guigira Krais khothɨgav ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi, ana nza shogim, nza vhɨzi. Ana ntigem guigira Krais khothɨgap ana zɨn vui buna vhuueŋ, ana ne bun nzuai. Ana fhum guigira mba buna vhuueŋ khothɨgi ntɨɨri, ana mben farfagi.”
